hero.title: Our Specialized Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive Renovation Solutions
hero.description: From kitchen transformations to complete home renovations, we offer a full range of services designed to enhance your living space with Danish craftsmanship and attention to detail.

kitchen.title: Kitchen Renovations
kitchen.description: Transform your kitchen into a functional and beautiful space that reflects Danish design principles.

bathroom.title: Bathroom Renovations
bathroom.description: Create a spa-like retreat with our expert bathroom renovation services.

living.title: Living Space Renovations
living.description: Redesign your living areas to maximize comfort, functionality, and aesthetic appeal.

outdoor.title: Outdoor Living Spaces
outdoor.description: Extend your living space outdoors with our deck, patio, and garden solutions.

consultation.title: Free Consultation
consultation.description: We visit your home to understand your needs and provide expert advice.

design.title: Custom Design
design.description: Our team creates detailed plans tailored to your space and preferences.

planning.title: Project Planning
planning.description: We coordinate all aspects of your project for smooth execution.

construction.title: Expert Construction
construction.description: Skilled craftsmen bring your vision to life with precision and care.

completion.title: Final Inspection
completion.description: We ensure everything meets our high standards before handover.

carpentry.title: Custom Carpentry
carpentry.description: Handcrafted furniture and built-ins that perfectly fit your space.

flooring.title: Flooring Solutions
flooring.description: Hardwood, laminate, and tile installation with expert finishing.

electrical.title: Electrical Work
electrical.description: Safe and efficient electrical installations and upgrades.

plumbing.title: Plumbing Services
plumbing.description: Reliable plumbing solutions for all your renovation needs.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Fair, honest, and upfront costs
pricing.description: We believe in transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Every project includes a detailed estimate and timeline.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.subtitle: Get a free consultation and detailed estimate for your renovation.

timeline.question: How long does a typical renovation take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope, but most kitchen renovations take 4-6 weeks, while bathroom renovations typically take 2-3 weeks.

cost.question: What factors affect renovation costs?
cost.answer: Costs depend on materials, project scope, complexity, and any structural changes required. We provide detailed estimates for all projects.

warranty.question: What warranty do you provide?
warranty.answer: We offer a 5-year warranty on all workmanship and a 1-year warranty on materials, ensuring your investment is protected.

meta.title: Renovation Services - Aarhus Contractor | Kitchen, Bathroom & Home Renovations
meta.description: Professional renovation services in Aarhus. Kitchen, bathroom, and complete home renovations with Danish craftsmanship and attention to detail.
meta.keywords: renovation services Aarhus, kitchen renovation, bathroom renovation, home improvement, Danish craftsmanship
